categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Skirmish on Iope was an event that occurred in 0 ABY between the Imperial assassin X-7 and the 10 mercenaries he hired for a job. X-7 wanted to test the skills of the mercenaries by opening fire on their ships as they approached the moon of Iope where he was waiting. X-7 was able to kill 5 of the mercenaries before Lune Oddo Divinian, one of the mercenary pilots, figured out that the visible base on the moon's surface was just a decoy. He then found the camouflaged weapons embankment and successfully destroyed them, ending the test.
